description: A man in an apron meticulously prepares a pasta dish in a modern kitchen. He watches a pot on the stove, sets a kitchen timer, enjoys a glass of red wine, and then carefully plates the spaghetti with sauce, olive oil, cheese, and basil.
name: The Culinary Ritual

description: The man, now without his apron, sits at his dining table at night, admiring the pasta he just made. He smiles, talks animatedly to someone off-screen, raises his glass in a toast, and begins to eat with satisfaction.
name: A Meal for One

description: The same man, now in a sweater, enters the dining room looking pensive. He adjusts a decorative centerpiece on the table and then walks out of the room, turning off the light.
name: Anxious Tidying

description: The man, now dressed as a janitor, hoses down the entrance of a modern apartment building. After finishing, he coils the hose and looks up at the building's facade.
name: The Janitor's Morning

description: A montage shows various people and families arriving at the apartment building, getting out of cars with luggage and shopping bags.
name: The Arrival of Residents

description: The janitor supervises two delivery men carrying a large 8K TV box into an apartment. A woman enters the room, and the janitor interacts with her and the delivery men.
name: The New Television

description: The opening credits roll over stylized shots of Venus flytraps, the janitor polishing a metal plaque, and interactions with residents, culminating in the title card 'EL ENCARGADO'.
name: Opening Credits

description: The janitor, Eliseo, is at his desk in the lobby, polishing a plaque. He has a tense, silent encounter with a resident, Zambrano. He then handles mail for another resident and speaks with a plumber outside.
name: Lobby Duties

description: At night, Eliseo, dressed in a suit, pushes a shopping cart full of garbage bags down a cobblestone street, interacting with homeless people and making what appears to be a clandestine exchange.
name: Night on the Streets

description: Eliseo has a friendly chat with a resident in the lobby. He then goes to the underground garage, stands before three cars, and uses a remote to unlock a blue one. He gets inside and inspects a small, hidden electronic device.
name: Garage Surveillance

description: Eliseo goes to an apartment to do a repair. He snoops around, peeking into a bedroom at a sleeping woman and then accessing private photos and emails on a computer. He is confronted by another woman and quickly leaves.
name: The Intrusive Repairman

description: Eliseo has a tense, silent elevator ride with Zambrano. After they exit, Eliseo makes faces at his reflection before going to his rooftop dwelling and walking out to survey the city.
name: Elevator Games and Rooftop Views

description: Eliseo puts on a friendly facade, welcoming a new resident and her son. He then continues his routine, sweeping outside and listening at an apartment door before another tense elevator ride with Zambrano.
name: The Facade

description: In a hidden basement room, Eliseo listens to a residents' meeting via a hidden bug. The room is a surveillance hub, with walls covered in detailed information about every resident. He adds a cigarette butt to Zambrano's board.
name: The Lair

description: A young man cleans the large glass windows of the lobby. Zambrano, pacing and talking on his phone, becomes agitated and confronts the cleaner, gesturing angrily.
name: Lobby Confrontation

description: A montage shows Eliseo's manipulative and voyeuristic activities: he visits an elderly resident, charming and unsettling her; he spies on another resident's computer; and from his rooftop, he uses binoculars to watch people in the opposite building, focusing on Zambrano.
name: Manipulation and Spying

description: Eliseo goes about his daily routine, then returns to his basement lair. He surveys his extensive surveillance boards, which detail the lives of all the building's residents, and turns to the camera with a sinister, triumphant smile.
name: The Mastermind
